tool_description: In today's interconnected world, understanding the origin and location of incoming requests is crucial for businesses and developers alike. Introducing the IP Geolocation API, a game-changing service that provides in-depth data for every IP address. With real-time precision and a wealth of insightful information, this API opens up a world of possibilities for businesses, developers, and security professionals.
name: IP Geolocation API
title: IP Geolocation API

api_list.name: /api/ip/{address}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-geolocation-api2.p.rapidapi.com/api/ip/85.97.189.123"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ip-geolocation-api2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-geolocation-api2.p.rapidapi.com/api/ip/{address}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ip-geolocation-api2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
